briefTitle: Trial of Lymphoseek in Intraoperative Localization of Lymph Nodes in Breast Cancer and Melanoma
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Prospective, Open-Label, Multicenter Comparison Study of LymphoseekÂ® and Vital Blue Dye as Lymphoid Tissue Targeting Agents in Patients With Known Melanoma or Breast Cancer Who Are Undergoing Lymph Node Mapping
summary: Data from this pivotal clinical trial will be used to support a marketing application (i.e., NDA) for Navidea's Lymphoseek for use in intraoperative localization of lymph tissue (nodes) in the lymphatic pathway draining the primary site of a tumor.

primaryOutcome.measure: Concordance of Blue Dye and Lymphoseek
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Surgery after injections of Lymphoseek and blue dye
